attributes.action: ban the burqa in the UK as a threat to our safety, country and Queen..
attributes.background: why are we not doing what our country should be doing and sticking to our roots?. why are we tolerating being forced to live in fear, would you not be afraid with people with balaclavas on?, we don't know who or what they are , or could be?. It's our country and queen and we shall not be ruled!!!...

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:  

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104649

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
